case.title: SEEKING FOR BRUNETTE TO HANG OUT WITH ( GENUINE ADD) - 23 (LONDON)
case.text:
Hello . Very attractive male, 23 years old white, mixed background( british and portuguese) athletic body seeking for a nice brunette to hang out. Due my lack of time, ( work) to hang out, i decided to have a go here. I'm very polite, well educated person, that knows how to treat a lady. Architect, living in Ladbroke groove. I consider myself genuine person, that loves to hang out and have a good laugh. Love to travel and do sports, surf an downhill mountain bike. I dont drink or smoke, but I love to have a good time!! Very talkative and mature, Im pretty sure we can have a good conversation, wont waste your time!!
If interested please drop me a email and I send you a pic :)
